title: Dan Greenawalt (Forza)
description: Dan Greenawalt creative director of the Forza games joins us to discuss Forza Horizon, his cars, physics, and Turn 10's extensive modeling and research processes.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
